topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5566b013636872774dd00800#post_5566b013636872774dd00800
Fun fact: 
Eskrima/Arnis/Kali is probably the only martial art that starts from weapons then goes down to bare hands the more one progresses. This is because back in tribal and colonial Philippines every Filipino is in possession of a bolo.

The Spaniards even outlawed practicing with a bolo so they switched to rattan sticks. This way the Spaniards think they were doing some sort of dance while they were actually training.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
Lucky Star ep17 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]Konata's birthday :D 

Wait when is her birthday anyways? *google search, May 28* WOW THAT'S NOT A COINCIDENCE AT ALL 

"Starting today I'm officially an adult!" damn Konata is like exactly my age then... 

SHE IS ME, SHE ALMOST HAS THE EXACT SAME BIRTHDAY TOO. THIS WAS FATE. I CALL HAX. 

"POK*MON, I MEMORIZED THE NAMES OF EACH AND EVERY ONE OF THEM" i have found my r63 >_> 

"you know how when you get irritated, and you make a bunch of little mistakes and get even more irritated?" a description of my life with approximately 97% accuracy 

Konata never studies, you know that 

"sure rains a lot during the rainy season" i don't think this one needs explanation 

WHY IS YUI SO UPBEAT TALKING ABOUT HUMIDITY. NOBODY LIKES HUMIDITY. INHUMAN LIFE-FORM DETECTED. 

nevermind, Yui just always has a permanent smile 

>references i don't understand 

woo strife 

that was a change of pace from the usual upbeat feel, it was done well though so yeah 

LUCKY CHANNEL AND I DON'T KNOW WHAT'S GOING ON ANYMORE :D 

where's the 4th wall again? we seem to have misplaced it[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

dat ED tho 

and this anime seems to slowly be taking a turn for the bizarre if this episode is any indication of the future
